meanings.definition: A type of pastry filled with fruit or cheese.
meanings.sent1: I enjoyed a delicious kolacky for dessert.
meanings.sent2: She bought a dozen kolacky for the party.
meanings.sent3: The kolacky looked so tasty, I almost ate the whole tray!
meanings.sent4: The warm kolacky was like a little piece of heaven in my mouth.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of freshly baked kolacky filled the kitchen with sweetness.

meanings.sent1: I love to kolacky with my grandma on weekends.
meanings.sent2: Let's kolacky together this weekend, it will be fun!
meanings.sent3: He tried to kolacky with chopsticks, but it was a messy affair.
meanings.sent4: She kolackied her way through the baking competition with ease.
meanings.sent5: Kolackying with friends always brings a smile to my face.
